meanings.sent1: The bird was overpassing the river effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The hiker was overpassing the mountain to reach the other side.
meanings.sent3: The cat was overpassing the lazy dog in a playful chase.
meanings.sent4: Her voice overpassing the noise of the crowd, capturing everyone's attention.
meanings.sent5: The sunlight overpassing the clouds, illuminating the entire valley.

meanings.sent1: His speed overpassing all the other runners in the race.
meanings.sent2: The student's grades were overpassing everyone else's in the class.
meanings.sent3: The chef's skills were overpassing all expectations, creating a masterpiece dish.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness overpassing any previous acts of generosity.
meanings.sent5: The athlete's determination overpassing any obstacles in his way to victory.

meanings.definition: A bridge or structure that allows one to pass over a road or railway
meanings.sent1: The overpassing above the highway provided a safe route for pedestrians.
meanings.sent2: The old overpassing was in need of repair due to its age.
meanings.sent3: The overpassing was a convenient shortcut for commuters avoiding traffic.
meanings.sent4: The overpassing stood tall, connecting the two sides of the city.
meanings.sent5: The overpassing offered a scenic view of the bustling city below.
